import plotly.express as px

# Top 10 Skills
top_skills = df['SKILLS'].str.split(',').explode().value_counts().head(10)

fig = px.bar(
    x=top_skills.values,
    y=top_skills.index,
    orientation='h',
    labels={'x': 'Count', 'y': 'Skill'},
    title='Top 10 Most In-Demand Skills'
)
fig.update_layout(yaxis=dict(autorange="reversed"))
fig.show()
